channel.title: Need Ideas!
channel.description:
Hello, as most of you know I am creating a server with Rubiks Cube. I am very bad at ideas and he usaully thinks of them; however he is not on right now and i need your guys/girls' ideas. If you have any great ideas for me to add into my server please tell me. I have created some and I am working on much more, any ideas would be greatly appreciated. [size=14pt]Here is what I have done.[/size]
-One Click Pickup -Fixed the 'no damage' glitch from Devolution v7 -Added fully working JAD emotes and added him as a boss(all except triple attack). -Added the party room from runescape.(drops a ton of random items when lever is pulled) -Changed Starting Area -Changed Training to 7 designated areas. -Deleted all unused monsters in autospawn.cfg -Added a command that adds the monsters to autospawn.cfg so they appear on server restart -Made the server compile before running.
[size=14pt]Here Are Some Pics Of What I Have Done.[/size] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/2cngqkk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/w1u22r.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/2zs0ld3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/j5c8aq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/j5c8aq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/16iaxoy.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/ne87es.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/20z6978.jpg[/img] Thanks, MrMoney

item.title: Need Ideas!
item.dc:creator: @MrMoney MrMoney
item.description:
@MrMoney wrote:

Thanks,
I might add.
Anyone want to help me make an objectClick Handler
I am not good with handlers

Read full topic

item.title: Need Ideas!

item.description:

item.title: Need Ideas!
item.dc:creator: @MrMoney MrMoney
item.description:
@MrMoney wrote:

Hello, as most of you know I am creating a server with Rubiks Cube. I am very bad at ideas and he usaully thinks of them; however he is not on right now and i need your guys/girls’ ideas. If you have any great ideas for me to add into my server please tell me. I have created some and I am working on much more, any ideas would be greatly appreciated.
[size=14pt]Here is what I have done.[/size]

-One Click Pickup -Fixed the 'no damage' glitch from Devolution v7 -Added fully working JAD emotes and added him as a boss(all except triple attack). -Added the party room from runescape.(drops a ton of random items when lever is pulled) -Changed Starting Area -Changed Training to 7 designated areas. -Deleted all unused monsters in autospawn.cfg -Added a command that adds the monsters to autospawn.cfg so they appear on server restart -Made the server compile before running.
[size=14pt]Here Are Some Pics Of What I Have Done.[/size] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/2cngqkk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/w1u22r.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/2zs0ld3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/j5c8aq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/j5c8aq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/16iaxoy.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/ne87es.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/20z6978.jpg[/img]

Thanks,
MrMoney
